item.title: Serendipity
item.description: “Great things happen when it’s least expected”. With the only intention of wanting to find out whether a fabric would be able to hold the dye, it was unexpected to receive the beautiful mixture of colours using a single colour of dye. This piece is a representation of the unexpected good things that happened in life.

item.title: Seize the Moment
item.description: Triumph (Screen-print & Paint on Fabric) Conquering hardships is the journey of growth. This piece was created during the time when I was about to leave high school, home, and ’expand my wings’ to explore the next chapter in life. Made with a combination of screen-printing and painting on fabric in large scale bold colour, with the intention of depicting a grand look.

item.title: Triumph

item.title: Bio
item.description: With a passion for design and love for all things creative, I thrive in environments where innovation and aesthetic are brought together. From coming up with new concepts, to collaborating on projects, I find joy in pushing the boundaries of conventional fashion and exploring new realms in artistic creations. Alongside my passion for design, I bring to the table exceptional organizational and management skills. My ability to visualize goals and maintain clarity during challenges allows me to persevere in projects, ensuring that every work produced reflects both creativity and meticulous planning.
